TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessagePropertyFilter extends System.Object

summary.span: 控制並選取當由訊息佇列窺視或接收訊息時所擷取的屬性。

span.span: Controls and selects the properties that are retrieved when peeking or receiving messages from a message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定上執行個體可控制的其內或接收訊息時，會擷取的屬性集。Setting the on a instance controls the set of properties that are retrieved when peeking or receiving a message. 執行個體上設定篩選所擷取的訊息資訊。The filter is set on the instance of that retrieves the message information. 當您將布林值的成員，才能`false`，防止資訊相關聯的屬性從正在擷取。When you set a Boolean-valued member to `false`, you prevent the information of the associated property from being retrieved by the . 有幾個不是布林值的篩選條件屬性。There are several filter properties that are not Boolean values. 取得或設定的預設大小的整數值都， ，或。They are integer values that get or set the default sizes of the , , or . 擷取一組有限的屬性，可協助改善效能，因為較少量的資料會從佇列傳送。Retrieving a limited set of properties helps improve performance because smaller amounts of data are transferred from the queue. 當設定的屬性，您只會指出是否要在接收或窺視訊息時，擷取該屬性。When setting a property on , you are only indicating whether that property is retrieved when a message is received or peeked. 您不會變更的相關聯的屬性值。You are not changing the associated property value for the . 建構函式會設定所有篩選條件屬性為其預設值，這的布林值是`false`。The constructor sets all filter properties to their default values, which for the Boolean values is `false`. 請參閱指派給整數值的屬性，預設值的建構函式主題。See the constructor topic for the defaults assigned to the integer-valued properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將兩個不同優先順序的訊息傳送至佇列，接著擷取它們。The following code example sends two messages of different priorities to the queue, and retrieves them subsequently. [!code-cpp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CPP/message_defaultandpriority.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CS/message_defaultandpriority.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/VB/message_defaultandpriority.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並設定所有屬性的預設值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and sets default values for all properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會將所有的布林值設定為`false`並將整數值的屬性設定為下表中所顯示的預設值。The constructor sets all Boolean values to `false` and sets the integer-valued properties to the default values shown in the following table. |屬性Property|預設值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||10241024| ||255255| ||255255| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式。The following code example demonstrates the use of the constructor. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#40)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AcknowledgeType { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在接收或窺視訊息時是否要擷取 屬性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別指定所傳送的應用程式要求的通知訊息的類型。The property of the class specifies the type of acknowledgment messages requested by the sending application. 通知類型的定義傳回認可的時機。The type of acknowledgment defines when acknowledgments are returned. 設定屬性，才能傳送訊息來要求特定類型的通知。Set the property before sending the message to request a specific type of acknowledgment. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Acknowledgment { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在接收或窺視訊息時是否要擷取 屬性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會指定訊息在管理佇列，這會決定產生的通知時系統傳送通知的型別。The property of the class specifies the type of acknowledgment messages the system posts in the administration queue, which determines when acknowledgments are generated. 通知會傳回從目的地佇列，並張貼訊息至原始訊息所指定。Acknowledgments are returned from the destination queue and posted as messages to the specified by the original message. 產生的認可類型取決於要求。The type of acknowledgment generated depends on what was requested. 讀取接收來自管理佇列來確認訊息原本傳送到訊息佇列的狀態訊息時的屬性。Read the property when receiving a message from an administration queue to verify the status of the message originally sent to the message queue. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將傳送和接收包含訂單與佇列的訊息。The following code example sends and receives a message that contains an order to and from a queue. 它特別要求正值通知，當原始訊息抵達或已從佇列擷取。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. [!code-cpp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CPP/message_acknowledgment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CS/message_acknowledgment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/VB/message_acknowledgment.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ArrivedTime { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在接收或窺視訊息時是否要擷取 屬性資訊。

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會指出訊息何時抵達目的端佇列的時間。The property of the class indicates when the message arrived at the destination queue. 這是調整 gmt，擷取訊息之電腦的當地時間。This is local time, adjusted from GMT, of the computer on which the message is retrieved. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#4)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在接收或窺視訊息時是否要擷取 屬性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會指定是否應該是或已附加至訊息。The property of the class specifies whether the should be or has been attached to the message. 由訊息佇列設定，所接收的佇列管理員用來驗證寄件者是否有佇列的存取權限。The is set by Message Queuing and is used by the receiving Queue Manager to verify whether the sender has access rights to a queue. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Authenticated { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在接收或窺視訊息時是否要擷取 屬性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別可由接收應用程式來判斷是否已要求驗證。The property of the class is used by the receiving application to determine if authentication was requested. 如果已經要求驗證，而且訊息在佇列中，已驗證訊息。If authentication was requested and the message is in the queue, then the message is authenticated. 您不可能以查看訊息的屬性並判斷訊息是否驗證失敗。It is not possible to look at the properties of a message and determine whether a message failed authentication. 驗證失敗的訊息會予以捨棄，而且不會傳遞至佇列。Messages that fail authentication are discarded and are not delivered to the queue. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AuthenticationProviderName { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在接收或窺視訊息時是否要擷取 屬性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會指定用來產生訊息的數位簽章的密碼編譯提供者的名稱。The property of the class specifies the name of the cryptographic provider used to generate the digital signature of the message. 通常是使用外部佇列時。 is typically used when working with foreign queues. 非 Microsoft Message Queuing 的佇列系統中存在的外部索引的佇列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. Microsoft Message Queuing 與透過連接器應用程式的這類佇列通訊。Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AuthenticationProviderType { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在接收或窺視訊息時是否要擷取 屬性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會指定用來產生訊息的數位簽章的密碼編譯提供者的類型。The property of the class specifies the type of cryptographic provider used to generate the digital signature of the message. 通常是使用外部佇列時。 is typically used when working with foreign queues. 非 Microsoft Message Queuing 的佇列系統中存在的外部索引的佇列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. Microsoft Message Queuing 與透過連接器應用程式的這類佇列通訊。Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#8)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在接收或窺視訊息時是否要擷取 屬性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別代表已序列化訊息的內容。The property of the class represents the serialized contents of the message. 主體可以包含最多為 4 MB 的資料。The body can contain up to 4 MB of data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#9)]

summary.span: 設定所有布林篩選值為 ，如此在接收訊息時就不會擷取任何訊息屬性。

span.span: Sets all Boolean filter values to , so that no message properties are retrieved when receiving a message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用設定所有布林屬性，以`false`。Use to set all Boolean properties to `false`. 這會導致沒有接收訊息時要擷取的訊息屬性。This causes no message properties to be retrieved when receiving messages. 值並不會影響， ，或。 does not affect the values for , , or . 在呼叫，就必須將至少一個篩選屬性設定為`true`才能接收訊息的相關資料。After calling , it is necessary to set at least one filter property to `true` in order to receive data related to a message. 您可以以任一設定個別屬性`true`，或您可以呼叫或。You can either set individual properties to `true`, or you can call or . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫方法。The following code example calls the method. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#37](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#37)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#37](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#37)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ConnectorType { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在接收或窺視訊息時是否要擷取 屬性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別時，需要應用程式設定通常會設定由訊息佇列的訊息屬性。The property of the class is required when an application sets a message property that is typically set by Message Queuing. 它用於下列兩個執行個體：It is used in the following two instances: - 連接器應用程式，以傳遞訊息時做是為了要解譯訊息的安全性與認可屬性的傳送與接收應用程式。When a message is passed by a connector application, the is required for the sending and receiving applications to interpret the security and acknowledgment properties of the message. - 傳送應用程式加密的訊息時屬性會通知訊息佇列 」 使用對稱金鑰。When sending application-encrypted messages, the property informs Message Queuing to use the symmetric key. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CorrelationId { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在接收或窺視訊息時是否要擷取 屬性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會指定可由認可和報告訊息來參考原始訊息的訊息識別項。The property of the class specifies a message identifier that is used by acknowledgment and report messages to reference the original message. 它提供的應用程式定義的識別項，接收應用程式可以用來排序訊息。It provides an application-defined identifier that the receiving application can use to sort messages. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將傳送和接收訊息，其中包含與佇列的順序。The following code example sends and receives a message containing an order to and from a queue. 它特別要求正值通知，當原始訊息抵達或已從佇列擷取。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. [!code-cpp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CPP/message_acknowledgment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CS/message_acknowledgment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/VB/message_acknowledgment.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DefaultBodySize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定預設主體緩衝區的大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the default body buffer.

value.span: 接收訊息時要建立的預設主體緩衝區大小。

span.span: The default body buffer size to create when the message is received.

value.span: 預設值為 1024 個位元組。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設主體大小指定為訊息的本文內容配置的位元組數目。The default body size specifies the number of bytes to allocate for the message's body contents. 屬性類別代表已序列化訊息的內容。The property of the class represents the serialized contents of the message. 主體可以包含最多為 4 MB 的資料。The body can contain up to 4 MB of data. 限制的主體大小可改善效能。Restricting the body size can improve performance. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DefaultExtensionSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定預設擴充緩衝區的大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the default extension buffer.

value.span: 接收訊息時要建立的預設擴充緩衝區大小。

span.span: The default extension buffer size to create when the message is received.

value.span: 預設值為 255 個位元組。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的延伸大小指定為訊息的延伸模組配置的位元組數目。The default extension size specifies the number of bytes to allocate for the message's extension. 屬性類別代表與訊息，例如二進位大型物件相關聯的其他的應用程式定義資訊。The property of the class represents the additional, application-defined information associated with the message, such as a binary large object. 要解譯的內容的應用程式負責。It is the responsibility of the application to interpret the contents of the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DefaultLabelSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定預設標籤緩衝區的大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the default label buffer.

value.span: 接收訊息時要建立的預設標籤緩衝區大小。

span.span: The default label buffer size to create when the message is received.

value.span: 預設值為 255 個位元組。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設標籤大小指定為訊息的標籤配置的位元組數目。The default label size specifies the number of bytes to allocate for the message's label. 屬性類別會指定訊息的標籤。The property of the class specifies the label of the message. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會識別訊息的原始目的佇列。The property of the class identifies the original destination queue of the message. 它通常用來判斷是日誌或寄不出的信件佇列中訊息的原始目的端。It is typically used to determine the original destination of a message that is in a journal or dead-letter queue. 它也可用時的回應訊息傳送至回應佇列。It can also be used when sending a response message back to a response queue. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#14)]

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會指定用來加密訊息的對稱金鑰。The property of the class specifies the symmetric key used to encrypt the message. 當您傳送應用程式加密的訊息，或是外部佇列來傳送加密的訊息時是必要。It is required when you send application-encrypted messages, or when you send encrypted messages to a foreign queue. 非 Microsoft Message Queuing 的佇列系統中存在的外部索引的佇列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. Microsoft Message Queuing 與透過連接器應用程式的這類佇列通訊。Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#15)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會指定用來驗證訊息的數位簽章。The property of the class specifies the digital signature used to authenticate the message. 在大部分情況下，它會產生並傳送應用程式要求驗證時，由訊息佇列設定。In most cases, it is generated and set by Message Queuing when the sending application requests authentication. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#16)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果訊息是私人的它會加密再傳送並接收時解密。If a message is private, it is encrypted before it is sent and decrypted when it is received. 屬性類別會指定用來加密私用訊息之訊息主體的演算法。The property of the class specifies the algorithm used to encrypt the message body of a private message. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會識別訊息的類型。The property of the class identifies the type of the message. 訊息可以是一般訊息、 正或負認可訊息或報告訊息。A message can be a normal message, a positive or negative acknowledgment message, or a report message. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#22](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#22)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#22)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Priority { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在接收或窺視訊息時是否要擷取 屬性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會影響訊息佇列處理訊息，而路由，方式與在到達其目的地時，將會放在佇列的訊息。The property of the class affects how Message Queuing handles the message while it is en route, as well as where the message is placed in the queue when it reaches its destination. 非交易式訊息只能設定有意義地加以訊息優先順序。Message priority can only be set meaningfully for non-transactional messages. 交易式訊息的優先順序會自動設定為零，這會導致交易式訊息的優先權會被忽略。The priority for transactional messages is automatically set to zero, which causes transactional message priority to be ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將兩個不同優先順序的訊息傳送至佇列，接著擷取它們。The following code example sends two messages of different priorities to the queue, and retrieves them subsequently. [!code-cpp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CPP/message_defaultandpriority.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CS/message_defaultandpriority.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/VB/message_defaultandpriority.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Recoverable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在接收或窺視訊息時是否要擷取 屬性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會指出是否保證訊息的傳遞，即使目的地佇列來路由訊息時電腦當機。The property of the class indicates whether delivery of a message is guaranteed, even if a computer crashes while the message is en route to the destination queue. 如果訊息的傳遞保證，訊息儲存在本機上的每一個步驟，直到訊息成功轉送至下一部電腦。If delivery of a message is guaranteed, the message is stored locally at every step until the message is successfully forwarded to the next computer. 設定至`true`訊息上可能會影響輸送量。Setting to `true` on the message could affect the throughput. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#23)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別識別接收會傳回到傳送應用程式所接收的應用程式的應用程式所產生的回應訊息的佇列。The property of the class identifies the queue that receives application-generated response messages that are sent back to the sending application by the receiving application. 應用程式傳送其訊息時所傳送的應用程式指定回應佇列。Response queues are specified by the sending application when the application sends its messages. 任何可用的佇列都可以指定為回應佇列。Any available queue can be specified as a response queue. 傳回至回應佇列的訊息是應用程式指定的。Messages returned to the response queue are application-specific. 應用程式必須定義什麼是訊息中以及執行接收到訊息的動作。The application must define what is in the messages as well as what is to be done when a message is received. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#24](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#24)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#24)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別主要供接收佇列管理員在驗證訊息。The property of the class is used primarily by the receiving queue manager when authenticating a message. 屬性會設定由訊息佇列，並可由 「 佇列管理員來確認訊息寄件者，以及寄件者可以接收佇列的存取權限。The property is set by Message Queuing and is used by the queue manager to verify who sent the message and that the sender has access rights to the receiving queue. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#26](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#26)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#26)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會指定用來傳送訊息的訊息佇列的版本。The property of the class specifies the version of Message Queuing used to send the message. 屬性是重要時使用的功能，例如異動處理才支援 Message Queuing 2.0 版和更新版本，或數位簽章可用來驗證版本 1.0 所傳送的訊息應該注意的項目。The property is important to be aware of when using features like transaction processing, which is only supported by Message Queuing version 2.0 and later, or digital signatures, which are used to authenticate messages sent by version 1.0. 設定所傳送的佇列管理員傳送訊息時。 is set by the sending queue manager when the message is sent. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#27](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#27)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#27)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別指出在傳送端電腦的日期和時間來源佇列管理員傳送訊息時。The property of the class indicates the sending machine's date and time when the message was sent by the source Queue Manager. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. summary.span: 指定在接收訊息時擷取所有訊息屬性。

span.span: Specifies to retrieve all message properties when receiving a message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用設定所有布林屬性`true`。Use to set all Boolean properties to `true`. 這會導致接收訊息時要擷取的所有訊息屬性。This causes all message properties to be retrieved when receiving messages. 值並不會影響， ，或。 does not affect the values for , , or . 在呼叫，您可以將個別的篩選值設定為`false`為了限制接收訊息時所擷取的屬性。After calling , you can set individual filter values to `false` in order to restrict the properties retrieved when the message is received. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫方法。The following code example calls the method. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#39)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetDefaults() cil managed

summary.span: 將一般訊息佇列屬性的篩選條件值設定為 ，並將整數值屬性設定為它們的預設值。

span.span: Sets the filter values of common Message Queuing properties to and the integer-valued properties to their default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用來進行下列設定布林值屬性，以`true`。Use to set the following Boolean-valued properties to `true`. 這些是最常見的屬性通常會與下列互動：These are the most common properties a will typically interact with the following: - - - - - - - - - - - 下表為其預設值設定的屬性。 sets the properties in the following table to their default values. |屬性Property|預設值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||10241024| ||255255| ||255255| 屬性代表所在已呼叫。The property represents a on which has been called. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫方法。The following code example calls the method. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#38)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SourceMachine { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在接收或窺視訊息時是否要擷取 屬性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別指定訊息起源所在的電腦。The property of the class specifies the computer where the message originated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#29](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#29)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#29](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#29)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TimeToBeReceived { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在接收或窺視訊息時是否要擷取 屬性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別指定的總時間 （秒） 傳送到從目的地佇列等候接收訊息。The property of the class specifies the total time in seconds for a sent message to be received from the destination queue. 要從目標佇列擷取訊息的時間限制包括到達目的地佇列，花費的時間加上應用程式擷取訊息之前的佇列中等候所花費的時間。The time limit for the message to be retrieved from the target queue includes the time spent getting to the destination queue, plus the time spent waiting in the queue before the message is retrieved by an application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#30)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TimeToReachQueue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別指定的時間限制，以秒為單位，才能到達目的端佇列傳送訊息的時間。The property of the class specifies a time limit in seconds from the time the message is sent for it to reach the destination queue. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#31](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#31)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#31)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TransactionId { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在接收或窺視訊息時是否要擷取 屬性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會識別在傳送訊息的交易。The property of the class identifies the transaction that sent the message. 使用這個屬性，接收應用程式內確認訊息已傳送的特定交易的一部分。Use this property within a receiving application to verify that a message was sent as part of a specific transaction. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#52](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#52)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#52](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#52)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TransactionStatusQueue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在接收或窺視訊息時是否要擷取 屬性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會識別來源電腦上的交易狀態佇列。The property of the class identifies the transaction status queue on the source computer. 屬性用於傳送認可訊息傳回給傳送應用程式。The property is used for sending acknowledgment messages back to the sending application. 連接器應用程式接收傳送至外部佇列的交易式訊息時，會使用的交易狀態佇列。The transaction status queue is used by connector applications when receiving transactional messages sent to a foreign queue. 非 Microsoft Message Queuing 的佇列系統中存在的外部索引的佇列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. Microsoft Message Queuing 與透過連接器應用程式的這類佇列通訊。Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#53](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#53)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#53](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#53)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseAuthentication { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在接收或窺視訊息時是否要擷取 屬性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會指定是否需要驗證訊息。The property of the class specifies whether the message needs to be authenticated. 您不可能以查看訊息的屬性並判斷訊息是否驗證失敗。It is not possible to look at the properties of a message and determine whether a message failed authentication. 驗證失敗的訊息會予以捨棄，而且不會傳遞至佇列。Messages that fail authentication are discarded and are not delivered to the queue. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#32)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會指定無法傳遞訊息的複本是否應該傳送到寄不出信件佇列。The property of the class specifies whether a copy of a message that could not be delivered should be sent to a dead-letter queue. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#33](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#33)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#33)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會指定訊息的複本是否應該保留在原始電腦上電腦日誌中。The property of the class specifies whether a copy of the message should be kept in a machine journal on the originating computer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#35](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#35)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#35)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseTracing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在接收或窺視訊息時是否要擷取 屬性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 表示接收 資訊，否則為 。
預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別會指定是否要向其目的地佇列為時加以追蹤訊息的路由。The property of the class specifies whether to track the route of a message as it moves toward its destination queue. 如果`true`，每次原始訊息通過訊息佇列路由伺服器，訊息佇列所產生的報告訊息傳送至系統的報告佇列。If `true`, each time the original message passes through a Message Queuing routing server, a Message Queuing-generated report message is sent to the system report queue. 使用追蹤牽涉到設定 Active Directory，並指定訊息佇列企業報告佇列。Using tracing involves setting up Active Directory and specifying a report queue for the Message Queuing enterprise. 系統管理員可以設定這些設定。These settings are configured by the administrator. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#36](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#36)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#36](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#36)]
